description:
Are you travelling to Germany for a holiday or for business? This course will exceed your expectations and in no time you will know plenty of German to go to Germany for a holiday or to speak successfully at a business meeting! So what are you waiting for and enroll today!

What's in it for you?

  • This course will ultimately provide you the key success and confidence to speak German at a business meeting or on a holiday.
  • It starts your journey to German giving you the basic knowledge and skills for speaking, writing and listening in German.
  • It teaches you the necessary structures and vocabulary to communicate in German.
  • This course gives you the confidence to speak German - very important!

It offers a 17 page guide on Grammar, an 11 page guide on Essentials, a section on 'How to order food', a section on 'How to get there', Podcasts and also contains 21 videos with dialogues and a large range of Vocabulary for your learning.

What does it include?

  1. Willkommen!
  2. Teacher's Recommendations
  3. Grammar
  4. Essentials
  5. How do you get there?
  6. How to order Food?
  7. Deutsch macht Spa√ü!
  8. More About German

Once you have completed this practical course, you will easily be able to speak German in confidence at that business meeting or on your holiday in Germany.

Enroll in this course now and start speaking German today!
title: Learn German for Beginners - For Business or Holidays!
